shapes3d.animation
Class VCam

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.animation.Camera
      shapes3d.animation.VCam
Direct Known Subclasses:
TerrainCam
public class VCam
extends Camera

This class provides a very simple 'portable video camera' that can me moved at a processor independent speed.
Future releases are likely to see additional features being added to this class.

Author:
Peter Lager

Constructor Detail

VCam

public VCam(PApplet app)
Creates a perspective camera. The default values are:
perspective(fov, aspectRatio, nearZ, farZ)
fov = PI/3
aspectRatio = width/height
nearZ = cameraZ / 1000000.0f
farZ = cameraZ*10.0f
where cameraZ is ((height/2.0) / tan(fov/2.0))
The nearZ value is much smaller than the default value in Processing to make sure the terrain is drawn right up to the camera position.

Parameters:
app -
Method Detail

camera

public void camera()
Set the camera position ready for drawing. Equivalent to camera() function in Processing

Specified by:
camera in class Camera

update

public void update(float time)
This should be used to update the cameras position etc. based on the time elapsed since last called.
